mapper.select: SELECT * FROM files WHERE projectId = #{projectId} AND projectStatus = #{projectStatus} AND iterationId = #{iterationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files(projectId, projectStatus, type, iterationId, name, source, creatorId, createTime, updateTime) VALUES(#{projectId}, #{projectStatus}, #{type}, #{iterationId}, #{name}, #{source}, #{creatorId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE files SET projectId = #{projectId}, projectStatus = #{projectStatus}, type = #{type}, iterationId = #{iterationId}, name = #{name}, source = #{source}, creatorId = #{creatorId}, updateTime = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
